parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The new password of the account. For more information about the password format, see the "Password Policies" topic.

parameters.name: PasswordForcedUpdateStatus
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable forcible password change upon first logon. Default value: disabled. Valid values:

*   enabled
*   disabled

parameters.name: UserNotificationChannels
parameters.description: The methods for receiving password notifications.
